string.name: name
string.value: In Search of a Cool Saddle
When you enter #b#m130000000##k, the home of people who mount birds, someone starts talking to you.

A person named #p1101002#, who is the Tactician in #m130000000#, tells you to leave since this island is only for Knights. He says that all the saddles for the Knights are made by #b#p2060005##k in the #b#m230000000##k... Would he be able to make a Dragon Saddle?

What gives you the right to step into #m130000000# without permission? State your name, job, and purpose. If you lie or if your purpose is not adequate, you will not be allowed to enter. \r\n#b#L0#This is a restricted area? But I've seen so many people enter and leave freely...#l\n#k
This island may only be accessed by Empress Cygnus's Knights. Since you did not realize this, I will let it slide. Now leave immediately.\r\n#b#L0#Wa..wait! Can you just answer one question?#l\n#k

Oh? You do have a purpose here then? Then state your name, job, and purpose.\r\n#b#L0#Okay... Evan. Dragon Master. Searching for a saddle. Look, all I need is a saddle so I can ride a Dragon, and I heard you can find great ones here. Just let me get a saddle and I'll be on my way...#l\n#k
Dragon Master? Are you like a Magician that commands a Bahamut?\r\n#b#L0#Huh? Er, no...I don't think so?#l\n#k
Hm! You're a strange one. Dragon Master... Never heard of it. I must make a note to look into that. You asked about a saddle?\r\n#b#L0#Yes! Do you know where I can get a saddle?#l\n#k
The Knights' saddles aren't made here. We just don't have the resources for that. We outsource our saddle production. Would you like to find out where?
Welcome to the #m230000000#! Are you an explorer? What? You want a saddle so you can ride the animal standing next to you?
All of the saddles for the Knights are made by #b#p2060005##k in the #b#m230000000##k. Please go there and leave #m130000000#.
